vclaim: In 2018, Trump helped Mullah Abdul Ghani Baradar get released from prison, in 2020 then-Secretary of State Mike Pompeo met with him, and in 2021 Baradar was set to become the new “president” of Afghanistan under Taliban rule.
title: Did Trump Admin Get Taliban Leader Out of Pakistani Prison?
subtitle: Mullah Abdul Ghani Baradar is a key public figure for the Taliban in Afghanistan.
author: Nur Ibrahim
